text.div:
This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/payeetype defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
subscriber SubscriberThe subscriber (policy holder) will be reimbursed.
provider ProviderAny benefit payable will be paid to the provider (Assignment of Benefit).
beneficiary BeneficiaryThe beneficiary (patient) will be reimbursed.
other OtherAny benefit payable will be paid to a third party such as a guarantor.

name: ClaimPayeeTypeCodes
title: Payee Type Codes
description: Codes indicating the type of party to be reimbursed for cost of products and services.
copyright: This material derives from the HL7 Terminology (THO). THO is copyright Â©1989+ Health Level Seven International and is made available under the CC0 designation. For more licensing information see: https://terminology.hl7.org/license

concept.definition: The subscriber (policy holder) will be reimbursed.
Any benefit payable will be paid to the provider (Assignment of Benefit).
Any benefit payable will be paid to a third party such as a guarantor.
